meanings.sent1: She carefully elevates the box onto the shelf.
meanings.sent2: Using a pulley system, they elevate heavy objects with ease.
meanings.sent3: The balloon's attempt to elevate the cat for a ride ended in chaos.
meanings.sent4: His kindness elevates him in the eyes of his peers.
meanings.sent5: The elevator slowly elevates to the top floor of the building.

meanings.sent1: Adding fresh herbs elevates the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise elevates overall health and well-being.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand promised to elevate his cooking skills to master chef level.
meanings.sent4: Her smile elevates the mood of everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The artist's use of vibrant colors elevates the painting to a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To promote to a higher rank or position
meanings.sent1: His hard work and dedication elevate him to the role of manager.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to elevate her to the position of vice president.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot was elevated to the status of office supervisor.
meanings.sent4: The victory in the competition elevated her to the rank of champion.
meanings.sent5: The promotion to team leader elevated his responsibilities within the organization.
